landing.subtitle: The All in One Event Management System

hero.title: Eventra
hero.subtitle: ALL IN ONE EVENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

whatIsEventra.description: Eventra is a platform to discover, create, and manage events, making it easy for organizers to list events and for users to browse and visit them.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to start your journey with Eventra
howItWorks.step1_desc: Enter your information and ensure your details are safe and secure with our platform.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Explore thousands of events happening around you or globally with ease.
howItWorks.step3_desc: Join the community, participate in events, and create memories that last a lifetime.

whyChooseUs.title: Everything you need to manage events effortlessly.
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Whether you're organizing a small meetup or a large-scale conference, Eventra provides the tools and security to make it a success.
whyChooseUs.feature1: Manage events with ease and efficiency.

pricing.title: Flexible Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Please visit the organization for which you want to purchase the credit for.

features.notified: Get notified for all people who has joined organization

footer.brandDesc: Empowering organizers to build extraordinary event experiences. The all-in-one platform for modern event management and collaboration.

newsletter.title: Stay updated
newsletter.desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and event tips.

footer.copyright: Â© 2026 Eventra Inc. All rights reserved.

hero.title: Event management magic.
hero.subtitle1: Powerful, flexible and data-driven, Eventra makes it easy
hero.subtitle2: to build the exact event that you think of.

showcase.title: A event management system created to be yours.
showcase.subtitle1: Tweak anything and everything to your liking.
showcase.subtitle2: See how our platform can transform your event planning and management.

more.subtitle2: Why should your management system be any different?

features.f1_desc: Streamline your event workflow with easy navigation and quick actions.
features.f2_desc: Guest are free to visit the event page and organizations page before considering to join us.
features.f3_desc: Eventra is fully responsive and can be accessed from any device.
features.f4_desc: Get deeper insights into your event performance and guest engagement at a glance.
features.f5_desc: Easily find and segment attendees with our powerful and flexible filtering system.
features.f6_desc: Organize your events and attendees exactly how you want with tiered sorting.

testimonials.subtitle: Eventra is the event management tool for everyone who values collaboration and seamless experiences.
testimonials.t1: Eventra made organizing our annual conference effortless. From registrations to live updates, everything was smooth and hassle-free.
testimonials.t2: As a startup hosting multiple workshops, Eventra helped us manage attendees, ticketing, and schedules without breaking a sweat.
testimonials.t3: We used Eventra for our fundraising gala. Tracking RSVPs, sending reminders, and checking in guests was so simple!
testimonials.t4: Eventraâ€™s dashboard gave us a clear view of attendees, ticket sales, and event analytics. Organizing webinars has never been easier.
testimonials.t5: Planning a large meetup felt overwhelming, but Eventra handled everythingâ€”from invites to feedback collectionâ€”seamlessly.
testimonials.t6: Eventra turned our event management from stressful to smooth. Automated notifications, attendee management, and analytics all in one place!

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of organizers building incredible events with Eventra. Start for free and see how easily you can scale your vision.
cta.footerText: No credit card required. Instant access.
